Spaghetti Carbonara.instructions: Boil spaghetti until al dente. In a pan, cook pancetta until crispy. In a bowl, whisk eggs with grated Parmesan and black pepper. Toss hot pasta with pancetta, then mix in the egg mixture off the heat. Stir well and serve immediately.

Margherita Pizza.instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C (430°F). Roll out pizza dough, spread tomato sauce, and top with mozzarella. Bake for 10-12 minutes until golden. Add fresh basil and a drizzle of olive oil before serving.

Pesto Pasta.instructions: Cook pasta until al dente. Blend basil, Parmesan, garlic, olive oil, and pine nuts into a smooth paste. Toss with pasta and serve with extra cheese.

Lasagna.instructions: Brown beef in a pan, add tomato sauce and simmer. Layer lasagna sheets with the sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella. Repeat layers and finish with Parmesan. Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 40 minutes.

Risotto alla Milanese.instructions: Sauté chopped onion in butter. Add arborio rice and toast for a minute. Deglaze with white wine, then add warm broth gradually. Stir in saffron and Parmesan, then serve creamy.

Caprese Salad.instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Layer with fresh basil leaves. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar, then season with salt and pepper.

Tiramisu.instructions: Whisk egg yolks and sugar until creamy. Mix in mascarpone. Dip ladyfingers in espresso and layer with mascarpone mix. Repeat and dust with cocoa. Chill for 4 hours before serving.

Minestrone Soup.instructions: Sauté onion, carrot, and celery. Add tomatoes, broth, and beans. Simmer for 30 minutes, then add zucchini and pasta. Cook until pasta is tender. Serve hot.

Focaccia.instructions: Mix flour, yeast, water, and salt. Knead into a dough, let rise, then press into a pan. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle rosemary. Bake at 200°C (400°F) until golden brown.
